protocol.name: P-G3863-1
protocol.text: Approximately 80 mg from 10 day old light grown Col-0 wild type seedlings were collected and ground to a fine powder under liquid Nitrogen. Samples were lysed in separate groups in RLT buffer (Qiagen).Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3863-2
protocol.text: Approximately 80 mg from 5 day old light grown VFB triple mutant seedlings were collected and ground to a fine powder under liquid Nitrogen. Samples were lysed in separate groups in RLT buffer (Qiagen).Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3863-5
protocol.text: Approximately 6 Â¼g of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets.
